intro.title: Accounting firm from Brno
intro.description: Accounting office JM tax s.r.o. provides comprehensive economic services for individuals, small, medium, and large companies. To ensure legal certainty, all clients have a contract with us for accounting or tax records.

about.title: About Us
about.search: Part of our services includes representing the client before the tax office, managing social security, and health insurance.
about.work: We provide an individual approach to clients, enabling a flexible response to all requests.
about.price: The company's aim is primarily to free up clients with proper accounting management, allowing them to fully focus on their business. Accounting management is entirely our responsibility.
about.b2b: For accounting and tax processing, we use accounting software POHOD SQL and TAX.

double_bookkeeping.description: We know that every accounting firm offers accounting services, but we want to offer something extra so that everything works as it should. Our goal is to adapt maximally to clients' requirements and choose the best option for the client, saving their time and money.
items: Management of petty and long-term assets
Management of receivables and liabilities overview
Processing VAT returns, control reports, and summary reports

Preparation of corporate income tax documents
We provide other services according to individual client needs
